tooltip.gaiacore.gaia_scanner: The §5Gaia Scanner§r scans for §5Gaia Cores§r when held. It will beep at a rate that increases the closer you are to a core.
tooltip.gaiacore.gaia_core: §5Gaia Cores§r can be found around the world and generates different resources depending on the type of core, assuming that the correct fuel and/or conditions are provided.
tooltip.gaiacore.energetic_gaia_core: §9Energetic§r §5Gaia Cores§r will spawn basic ores on each non-input side when powered
